title: Abbott Elementary: [Spoiler] Just Got Fired After School Audit — Who Should Replace Them?
description: Warning: The following contains spoilers for Wednesday’s Abbott Elementary. Proceed at your own risk! Someone at Abbott Elementary is in need of a new job, and we’re not talking about a second gig for extra spending money à la Gregory. During Wednesday’s episode of the ABC comedy, Crystal visited the school, wanting to know why […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Shifting Gears EP Lays Out Season 2 Plans for Matt and Eve, Riley and Gabe and a M.I.A. Family Member
description: ABC’s Shifting Gears ended Season 1 with a kiss… just not the one audiences might’ve anticipated. During Wednesday’s finale, an inebriated (and newly single) Riley attempted to plant one on Gabe, but he resisted, explaining that, if they ever were to become more than friends, he would want it to happen at the “right time.” […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: Behind Happy Face: Interviews with the Cast & Creators on Reframing True Crime
description: We had the opportunity to talk with Dennis Quaid, Annaleigh Ashford, Melissa G. Moore, James Wolk and more about Happy Face. The post Behind Happy Face: Interviews with the Cast & Creators on Reframing True Crime appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Good American Family Series Premiere Successfully Adds More Perspectives to the Natalia Grace Story
description: The Good American Family two-episode series premiere dives deep into the Natalia Grace story and the increased focus on Kristine is stellar. The post Good American Family Series Premiere Successfully Adds More Perspectives to the Natalia Grace Story appeared first on TV Fanatic.
